actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to grant duty-free treatment of: (1) 2,2-bis-(4-Cyanatophenyl); (2) aminoethylphenylpyrazole (phenylmethylaminopyrazole); (3) benzethonium chloride; (4) malononitrile; (5) metaldehyde; and (6) paraldehyde. Reduces the duty on other nitriles. Provides for specified staged rate reductions.

titles.title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to certain chemicals.
